response.answer_text: No, Snapdragon 732G has a Qualcomm® Snapdragon™ X15 LTE modem which doesn’t comes with 5G support. This is an successor to Snapdragon 730G with improved performance upto 15%. As of now in Snapdragon 700 series there are two SoCs that supports 5G they are Snapdragon 765G and 768G. Apart from that no other processor from 700 series support 5G.

Actually, the processor will have an Adreno 618 GPU. There will be no support for 5G connectivity. On the connectivity front, it might come with the same Qualcomm Snapdragon X15 LTE modem with 4G VoLTE support. ... The other specifications are expected to remain the same as on the Snapdragon 730 and 720g.
